meanings.definition: A device used to ring a bell by pulling a cord or chain.
meanings.sent1: I grabbed the bellpulls in the church to make the bell ring.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautiful bellpulls next to the front door.
meanings.sent3: As a prank, someone tied all the bellpulls together, causing chaos in the church.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the house like the sound of multiple bellpulls being pulled.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the bellpulls made them look like elegant decorations.

meanings.definition: The act of pulling a bell cord to ring a bell.
meanings.sent1: With a swift motion, he performed the bellpulls to announce the start of the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the bellpulls echoed through the quiet village, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor pretended to struggle with the bellpulls, creating a comedic moment.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the force behind the ringing of multiple bellpulls.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the bellpulls created a soothing atmosphere in the church.
